entry.data:
CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

A SLIGHT CHANCE OF FREEZING RAIN IN THE MORNING
RAIN SHOWERS
ICE ACCUMULATION AROUND A TRACE
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION NEAR 100 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS AROUND 30
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 16
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING EAST AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

RAIN
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

CLOUDY
RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SNOW AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY

HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AND SNOW IN THE AFTERNOON
